rukus.text: 97|1|hontōni ware wa, mītsu no yoru ni, kono (kuruān) o kudashita.
97|2|Mītsu no yoru ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
97|3|Mītsu no yoru wa, sen tsuki yori mo masaru.
97|4|(Sono yoru) tenshi-tachi to seirei wa,-nushi no yurushi no moto ni, subete no kami inochi o motarashite kudaru.
